The image of the purported letter was pu: 2021, and has been shared more than 250 times.
The caption accompanying the image in Ch: This is the memo Trump left to Biden at the White House. Trump is the real winner."
The letter is dated January 20: 2021, and reads, "Joe, you know I won."
Forensic analysis of the photo using the: WeVerify reveals that the image has been doctored, as evidenced by the traces left by consecutive JPEG compressions and the presence of red patches in the image. Additionally, the seal on the letter, which reads 'Seal of the President of the United States,' does not match the official seals used in previous letters sent by Trump.
